commands.commandDescription: Packet inspection can yield crucial data about the network, including IP ranges and network devices through broadcast messages

linuxCommands.commandGroupDescription: tcpdump can be used to intercept network traffic, the output can later be analyzed with Wireshark

windowsCommands.commandGroupDescription: pktmon is a tool that can be utilized to intercept network traffic. The resulting pcap file can later be analyzed using Wireshark
